title: Firefox will not load anymore

All of this seemed to have started when I downloaded Thunderbird, which I have also deleted off the computer. That is the only thing I have downloaded on this computer. I have noticed a white box appears on screen, bottom right corner every time I try to open Firefox. Nothing is in the box. I have deleted and reinstalled the software. Nothing seems to work.

My system is Windows 10
creator: galtwho

title: Problemas de Carga y Respuesta de Paginas
content:
Amigos De un par de semanas a la fecha, se presentan estos problemas en la versión en español 105.0.1 (actual), antes de describirlos menciono:

  • No tengo VPN
  • No tengo proxy
  • No tengo bloqueadores habilitados en las paginas que comentaré
  • La misma operación en el mismo dispositivo SI SE PUEDE ejecutar en otros navegadores: EDGE o SAFARI
  • Mi internet es estable y de bajada opera con 20 MB
  • Las páginas de los proveedores, no presentan problemas. Ya hablé con sus áreas de soporte
  • Ya borré cookies, cache,...

CASO 1: primevideo.com En últimos días, películas varias, no se despliegan, apareciendo un mensaje que indica: EXISTE UN PROBLEMA CON EL REPRODUCTOR DE ESTE VIDEO.

A decir de la gente de amazon.com, el problema es del navegador y recomiendan usar otro. Ellos indican que la pelicula esta disponible en México, y que no tienen un reporte semejante.


CASO 2: no se pueden ejecutar pagos en STRIPE, OPEN PAY Al cargar los datos de la tarjeta para realizar pago e indicar se ejecuten, se presenta una pagina en blanco y no se realiza ninguna operacion.

A decir de los proveedor, en sus consolas de control ellos si pueden ejecutar la operación. Me dieron otras opciones con pago en OXXO, transferencia bancaria,... sin embargo, este problema me impide una continuidad en la operación y aunque son alternativas, no resuelve mi problema de navegacion.

Hice el pago en SAFARI y todo funcionó correctamente.


CASO 3: NO DESPLIEGA ARCHIVOS XML En México, el sistema tributario nos exige la emisión de facturas a traves de documentos XML, anteriormente cuando recibia estos se visualizaban en el navegador, de un tiempo a la fecha solo se muestra una pagina en blanco, lo que me ha obligado a revisar estas operaciones en EDGE o SAFARI sin problema.


¿Pueden ayudarme?

title: TLS Handshake and separate error messages on two diferent sites I visit regularly
content:
Hello,

In the last week, I have noticed an error message on a site that I usually log onto, and am unable to do so which looks like this: Secure Connection Failed An error occurred during a connection to www.plus.net. PR_END_OF_FILE_ERROR The page you are trying to view cannot be shown because the authenticity of the received data could not be verified. Please contact the web site owners to inform them of this problem. I have contacted the web site owners, and they have said it is my browser as the site is working correctly.

The second issue is that I am able to log onto my gumtree homepage, but unable to access my account due to the following: I have checked my Firefox browser and it is running the latest version 105.0.1 I have noted that on the bottom left of the page when trying to access my messages or manage my ads the following is happening but times out after 15 seconds: Unable to perform tls handshake to sa.gumtree

Gumtree have said this is a browser issue, so that is why I am contacting you for assistance.

I look forward to hearing from you, at your earliest convenience.

Best regards, Arvin Kumar

title: Trying to connect to Synology DSM, unable to connect with Firefox, but works fine in Chrome or Edge
content:
Hello, I'm using a Synology NAS (DS220+) installed on my local network, behind my internet box). This NAS can be accessed both from the local network (https://192.168.1.nn:ppppp) and remotely across Internet (https://subdomain.domain:yyyyy). With Firefox I can access my NAS locally but not remotely. While this works fine with Chrome or Edge.

As my issue looks like another one on your support site ("Page won't load in Firefox, but works fine in any other browser", opened 7/1/21, 3:39AM), I applied part of the proposed solution: run Firefox in troubleshooting mode, cleared history, cookies, cache; did a refresh; removed then reinstalled Firefox, created a brand new profile. Without success.

Would you please have some ideas to help me? Thanks and regards Matteo

If the following can help: - My laptop: Dell Latitude 5431, CPU 12th Gen Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-1250P 1.70 GHz; RAM 16Gb - Windows 11 Professional, 22H2 build 22621.521 - Firefox 105.0.1 (64bits)

title: Firefox shrinks page when trying to print label (since uptdate to 102.3.0esr)
content:
I'm using an online inventory system and regularly need to print barcode labels. This was all working fine until I updated to 102.3.0esr. Now, the data shrinks to a tiny part of the page when I go to print it. (See screenshots of what it looks like prior to going to the print dialogue and then when I actually go to print it). I've checked various settings suggested on previous posts that sound like the same problem but none of these work (Scaling, shrink, printer margins, clearing the cache etc.). If I choose a different printer and select A4 paper, the data looks to be the correct size (i.e. set for a 2x1 label), albeit on a much larger page.

I downloaded Chrome and I can get it to display and print ok from there. I just don't know what's happened in Firefox. Also, it's not just my system - one of my colleagues had a problem with a standard release. We changed him to the esr version (prior to the 102.3.0 update) and it worked ok then. Obviously something has happened in this update. Any help would be appreciated.
